revised_title: D and E Region Winds Over Europe: Results of E-Layer Drift Measurements at De Bilt
tldr: The author conducted extensive research on the D and E region winds over Europe, using E-layer drift measurements at De Bilt. They discovered the daily pattern and seasonal variations of the winds, which helped in understanding the behavior of the ionosphere and its impact on weather patterns. The study also compared the results with other stations at similar latitudes, providing valuable insights into the regional differences in wind patterns.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Meteorology and Climate
